meaningMnemonic: Someone is reaching out with their <radical>fingers</radical> to <radical>call</radical> for you. They <kanji>beckon</kanji> you closer, this way.
readingMnemonic: The person <kanji>beckon</kanji>ing you is the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう). You can't help but obey the Shougun's beckoning call.
